participant_1.background:
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
i am fascinated with ghosts.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
i want to get married again.
I'm happy with my life and my health.

participant_2.background:
I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
i sleep most of the day.
I spend my free time fixing up junk cars and making YouTube videos about it.

content.text: Hey how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking! I'm excited to get to know you better.
Same here, it's nice to meet you! What do you do for fun?
I love to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend, and I'm also really interested in ghosts.
Oh that's cool! I love to edit videos and spend time with my pug on rainy days.
What's your favorite thing about your pug?
I love his personality, he's always so happy and playful.
That's awesome! Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I love to make YouTube videos about fixing up junk cars.
That's really cool! I've always been interested in cars, but I'm not very mechanically inclined.
It's really not that hard, you just have to be patient and persistent.
I'll have to give it a try sometime!
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I appreciate the vote of confidence.
